name: The Sentence Without A Country II Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text: I abhor "A," I despise "B," I can't stand "C" or "D," and I really ________ !
questions.explanation:
Haiti.

	I abhor "A," I despise "B," I can't stand "C" or "D," and I really hate "E"!

questions.text: Every time I look at that baby, he ________. He must hate me.
questions.explanation:
Wales.

	Every time I look at that baby, he wails. He must hate me.

questions.text: I am really ____________ can't get as many miles per gallon as a hybrid car.
questions.explanation:
Madagascar.

	I am really mad a gas car can't get as many miles per gallon as a hybrid car.

questions.text: He just escaped from jail, and he's getting away! Look at that _____________ !
questions.explanation:
Congo.

	He just escaped from jail, and he's getting away! Look at that con go!

questions.text: Blimey, 'e's a right sod, that one! __________ me out of me fortune!
questions.explanation:
Egypt.

	Blimey, 'e's a right sod, that one! 'E gypped me out of me fortune!

questions.text: I need some __________________ fowl, all of the old ones were eaten by coyotes.
questions.explanation:
New Guinea.

	I need some new guinea fowl, all of the old ones were eaten by coyotes.

questions.text: Hey, buddy! Are you _________ eat that last French fry, or do I have to do it for ya?
questions.explanation:
Ghana.

	Hey, buddy! Are you gonna eat that last French fry, or do I have to do it for ya?

questions.text: War is dangerous! You might be hit by mortar fire,  a ___________, bomb or poison gas!
questions.explanation:
Grenada.

	War is dangerous! You might be hit by mortar fire,  a grenade, a bomb or poison gas!

questions.text: If you want to hear the pigeons __________________ until the sun rises!
questions.explanation:
Kuwait.

	If you want to hear the pigeons coo, wait until the sun rises!

questions.text: Women! If your _________ fitting, it may chafe you!
questions.explanation:
Brazil.

	Women! If your bra's ill-fitting, it may chafe you!
